inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who are candidates for aortic valve replacement
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function and EF was 25%.

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have previously undergone other aortic valve surgery
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: Patient's exact date of birth is not provided, but age is given as 48 years. No mention of previous aortic valve surgery or current infection.
